title: Player using Riot tag
body:
Not sure where to post this to generate the most attention, so will be posting it in various relevant forum subtopics until replied to by a riot employee. 
unable to post screenshots from game for some reason
came back after a year, had issues with my moniter in game,
upon fixing these issues, returned to find that Riot WickedBunny? had been delcaring lies about me in the chat log
possbility:
1.) my partner held the adc role, someone asked for the adc role, and my partner declared his willingness to give it up
- I typed "no eat my ass" as my partner offered the adc role to the other player, which the other player accepted
- the adc role was granted to the player who desired it, and my lobby partner went top varus, everyone got the role they desired, I was sure my message had obviously been viewed as a troll, as I had never held any bottom role to begin with.
Riot WickedBunny then proceeded to tell the enemy team that I had talked shit and afkd, and asked them to report me.
neither of these statements are true.
I never left the game connection. My moniter simply became unplugged slightly, whcih I was able to fix within a couple minutes of examination, and promptly returned to the game (to which I discovered this player's inaccurate statements)
Within the game I continued to maintain a level of maturity that was unrivaled by the player using the RIOT tag, which convinced me that this player was using the tag in error, and was indeed hacking.
For some reason I am unable to find where these screenshots are located within my hard drive, but upon description of where to find and how to post these files, can provide ample evidence that this player is very clearly not a Riot employee and is indeed misrepresenting the views of this company

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

I've looked at your logs, and you were harassing and trying to start general 'shit'. They said less than 10 lines the entire game, where you said over 100.

If you'd like, I'd be happy to post your chat logs from the game.

>Riot WickedBunny then proceeded to tell the enemy team that I had talked shit and afkd, and asked them to report me.


but did this happen?

Doesn't matter if it did or didn't in this case; OP is responsible for OP's behavior, and the other player is responsible for their behavior. Nothing the other player does in this case excuses OP, and vice-versa.
I am not defending the OP i was just curious.

One naming is against the naming and shaming rules so your gonna have to edit out the name.
two the boards really isnt the place for this.  If you feel someone was wrongfully using the riot name submit a support ticket.  Theres not a whole lot any of us could do unless a rioter stumbles upon this post.
I'd want to know if a Rioter told the enemy team to report you. Thats important, as thats against the code of conduct.

You should not blame your teammates when you played suck, just blame yourself and find why your teammates report you. I think in your game, your performance was not good and you didnt communicate with them. Thats all your false.

While its considered negative to ask for reports in all chat, even if its justified, so technically the riot dude shouldnt do that, another rioter Tantram specificaly, who i personaly have seen deliver a lot of justice on the forums said you were much more negative. If you simpl wanted to report a player who you think is using Riot tag without being a rioter, you could just report him for Innapropriate summoners name, and riot guys would resolve it, but clearly this is a rant about a bad game you had.

On the other hand, when you are creating a new account it says please dont use RIOT, so unless the guy is a rioter, he probably wont last long with that name, all you had to do is report innap. username

Son, please go home with me, you have played league for a few years still act like shxt...but it's fine, as a father and a family member, no one would blame u or look down on you, I mean if you go home with me, i will teach you how to farm and kill. but above all, you need to learn dat respect is the most important shxt in  your life. anyway, i felt shamed that i have a son like you, but i'm okay with that since I know you'r born to be a hater and sucker....no worry, daddy will save u. pardon for my poor english son. and last thing. TAIWAN NO.1!

Judging bu Your recent game history you are noting but a feeder/tolling toxic player. Why are you even come to player behavior forum claiming about others? It's like a match trying to warm up by wood fire, mouse comes to a cat asking for cheese. Are you trying to dig yourself a grave? Low self-awareness even. 

You talked shit in lobby and in game, afked for several minutes in game and fed the enermy super hard while verbally insulting your teammates. You basically took every reason to be reported in one single game and you still whimsing about others. I don't even know how badly you need attention to actually justify doing this. 

Get mature as you "claimed" you were. Stop playing LOL if you can't handle yourself in video games.

I'm rather skeptical that a rioter would ask for reports, as I'd like to think rioters would know that a single report is sufficient to trigger review (e.g. their own). 

If people were raging at you perhaps they might do more of a 'hush, just report them after and it'll be addressed' type thing to try to control the situation, but actively trying to get others to report when it would do nothing (assuming they personally reported) seems dubious.

You said "no eat my ass", he said you were talking shit. True.

Your monitor malfunctioned and it took you a couple minutes to fix it. He said you AFK'd. True.

Where are all these lies? You know AFK stands for Away From Keyboard. This means, the player who is AFK simply isn't playing. He is not using his keyboard. It's a simplified, blanket term, for anyone who is standing doing nothing. It doesn't mean you literally have to disconnect to be "afk". So you told him to "eat my ass" as a joke, according to you... well, not many people take it as a joke. You said you thought it was disregarded as a troll. So you troll chat and go afk for a couple minutes. Can't you understand why this person would think you are a troll? It's simple critical thinking. Don't be upset, you brought it on yourself.

All I'm saying is, it sounds like a misunderstanding. A reasonable one, at that. Can't you just laugh it off? Like aww man I said eat my ass, and then of course my monitor fucks up, so I look like even more of a troll. Figures. Just chalk it up as a misunderstanding caused mainly by yourself.

That's a real Rioter. 

If he did behave as you said, he'll loose his job, and I doubt any Rioter will be silly enough to do that. 

But this surely isn't the place to report people. If you wish to do so, please report them in the post game lobby.

U are just a loser who only want to draw someone elseâ€™s attention in a video game and could not even afford a good monitor to play the game with. You was ignored by us for the whole game but you keep acting like a whining-ass b i c h. How miserable ur life is?
